text: Jenna Dewan has become a sort of bona fide beauty guru. The actress - slash - dancer recently launched her own beauty channel on YouTube and has since divulged all sorts of secrets — everything from her 3 - concealer hack to the body oil she calls “ heaven in a bottle. ” Next up? Dewan ’ s revealing the secret to thick, enviable brows — that last all day and also look thick, yet natural. Because, as she shares in this video on her YouTube channel, “ I really think brows frame a face, ” she says. “ I have nothing on the face, maybe a little bit of concealer, but if the brows are good, the face is framed and I ’ m ready to go. ” To start this all off Dewan uses a spoolie
